title: 如何检测虚拟玩家的某个计分板分数是否小于某值
author: ouuan
txt_content:
例如：我先在控制台输入：（aaa不存在）
/scoreboard objective add bbb dummy bbb
/scoreboard players set aaa bbb 80
复制代码此时要检测aaa的bbb分数是否小于100,然后输出红石信号

replies.author: chyx
replies.txt_content:
scorpio975 发表于 2015-8-26 17:51
教程 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-440268-1-1.html
楼上回答全部错误。
假玩家并非实体 自然无法用实体选择器
不过还是有办法的

scoreboard players test <player> <objective> <min> [max]        
Outputs whether or not player's score in objective is within the range min to max (inclusive). If not specified or if "*" is used, max defaults to 2,147,483,647. Using a "*" for min means -2,147,483,648. "*" may be used to represent all players tracked by the scoreboard.        
objective must exist, and player's score in it must exist and be at least min and no greater than max. Note that player does not need to be online or even exist.
使用该指令

replies.author: scorpio975
replies.txt_content:
ouuan 发表于 2015-8-26 17:40
就是两个队伍计分，小于0时输
这个只要有两个队伍的玩家就可以了，先要有两个计分板，比如1和2

/scoreboard teams add 1 1复制代码/scoreboard teams add 2 2复制代码
建立两个队伍，前面是创造队伍名称，后面是显示名称

/scoreboard teams join 队伍名称 玩家/实体名称复制代码
把实体加入队伍

/testfor @a[score_1=0,team=1]复制代码/testfor @a[score_2=0,team=2]复制代码
检测某队伍的玩家是否到达分数【高频】

/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar 计分板名复制代码
显示在侧边栏
